name: Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: 2 lbs Mushrooms (cleaned, stems saved) stems (chopped up)
8 slices of bacon 12 oz. cream cheese
steps: ½ or ¼ onion 1 c. grated cheese (cheddar)
Medium skillet sauté bacon till brown and crumble drain, but do not rinse pan. Add mushroom stems and onions
Cook until tender. Add bacon and cream cheese till slightly melted. Preheat oven to 350. Stuff mushrooms with
mixture . Cover with cheese and pu on lightly greased cookie sheet. Bake 10-­‐15 minutes.
Large uncooked mushrooms 1/2 cup parmesan cheese
country style sausage 1/2 cup diced fine onion
Mix all the ingredients. Wash mushrooms, remove stems. Put small amount of sausage in center of mushroom where
the stem used to be. Bake in oven at 350 until sausage is cooked. Serve hot.
